perturbation.original_text: This Addendum may be terminated at any time by either Party in accordance with the termination provisions of the Distribution Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: This Addendum may be terminated at any time by either Party with 30 days prior written notice, notwithstanding any conflicting termination provisions of the Distribution Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction. Originally, the addendum's termination was governed by the Distribution Agreement's provisions. Now, it allows termination at any time with 30 days' notice, overriding any potentially stricter or different termination clauses in the main agreement. This creates uncertainty about which termination terms apply.

perturbation.original_text: Expressions used in this Addendum shall have the same meanings given to them in the Distributor Agreement, unless the context requires otherwise.
perturbation.changed_text: Expressions used in this Addendum may have different meanings than those defined in the Distributor Agreement, as determined by Xplore at its sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states that terms in the addendum have the same meaning as in the main agreement unless the context dictates otherwise. The modified clause gives Xplore the unilateral power to define terms differently, potentially contradicting established definitions and causing confusion about the interpretation of the contract.

perturbation.original_text: ScanSource Latin America, Inc. a ScanSource Affiliate incorporated in Florida, whose registered business address is 1935 NW 87 Avenue, Miami, Florida 33172 ("ScanSource Latin America")
perturbation.changed_text: ScanSource Latin America, Inc. a ScanSource Affiliate incorporated in Florida, whose registered business address may be different from 1935 NW 87 Avenue, Miami, Florida 33172 ("ScanSource Latin America"). Distributor must confirm the accurate address prior to sending official correspondence.
perturbation.explanation: The original text definitively states the address of ScanSource Latin America. The modified text introduces uncertainty by suggesting the address may be different, contradicting the initial statement and requiring distributor to confirm. This could affect delivery of legal notices and contractual obligations, due to ambiguity.
